title: Bug 47910 - ajc outjar jarfile does not contain MANIFEST.MF
description: When using the ajc command to create an output jar file, it does not include the MANIFEST.MF file even when there is a METAINF/MANIFEST.MF file present.
OB: An output file is created with a .jar extension, but it is not a valid jar file because there is no MANIFEST.MF file included.
EB: The output jar file should include the MANIFEST.MF file from the METAINF directory.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Run the ajc command with the sourceroots option pointing to a directory. 
2. Specify an output jar file using the outjar option. 
3. Verify that the created jar file contains the MANIFEST.MF file from the METAINF directory.
